revision.text:
<!--섬_정보-->
{{ TemplateMapping 
| mapToClass = Island 
| mappings = 
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 나라 | ontologyProperty = country }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 면적 | ontologyProperty = areaTotal | unit = squareKilometre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty =  높이 | ontologyProperty = height | unit = Length }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 주요_섬 | ontologyProperty = majorIsland }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 군도 | ontologyProperty = archipelago }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 인구 | ontologyProperty = populationTotal }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 인구밀도 | ontologyProperty = populationDensity | unit = PopulationDensity }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 위치 | ontologyProperty = locatedInArea }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 대도시 | ontologyProperty = largestCity }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 수도 | ontologyProperty = capital }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 행정구역이름 | ontologyProperty = region }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 행정구역 | ontologyProperty = region }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 민족 | ontologyProperty = ethnicity }}

end}}


<!-- Not Yet Mapping
|좌표={{좌표3|37|30|00|N|130|51|30|E}}
|최고점=성인봉(聖人峯)
-->
